title: Boston Scientific Earnings, Revenue beat in Q3
text:
© Reuters. Boston Scientific Earnings, Revenue beat in Q3

Investing.com - Boston Scientific (NYSE: ) reported third quarter that beat analysts' expectations on Wednesday and revenue that topped forecasts.

The firm reported earnings per share of $0.39 on revenue of $2.71B. Analysts polled by Investing.com forecast EPS of $0.38 on revenue of $2.65B. That compared to EPS of $0.35 on revenue of $2.39B in the same period a year earlier. The company had reported EPS of $0.39 on revenue of $2.63B in the previous quarter.

For the year, Boston Scientific shares are up 5.21%, under-performing the S&P Global (NYSE: ) 100 which is up 17.17% year to date.

Boston Scientific follows other major Healthcare sector earnings this month

On Tuesday, October 15, 2019, J&J reported third quarter EPS of $2.12 on revenue of $20.73B, compared to forecasts of EPS of $2.01 on revenue of $20.08B.

Novartis ADR earnings beat analyst's expectations on Tuesday, with third quarter EPS of $1.41 on revenue of $12.17B. Investing.com analysts expected EPS of $1.33 on revenue of $11.71B

Stay up-to-date on all of the upcoming earnings reports by visiting Investing.com's earnings calendar
description: Boston Scientific Earnings, Revenue beat in Q3
